title: A True friend
creator_credit: Laura O'Donnell, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: If Laura O’Donnell could give out an award for Best Friend, her neighbour Bree would get it. The share a close bond, despite differences and going to seperate schools. O’Donnell celebrates their friendship.
creator_credit_for_label: Laura O’Donnell, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
